Topic.Title: Need names? plot ideas? character classes? Anything else?

Posts.EditableText:
Because it can be tough to come up with names, places, and so on, people use generators.

And the mother of all generators site is Seventh Sanctum:  http://www.seventhsanctum.com/

you'll find generators for a huge number of different things, and links to sites with even more generators. Check it out.
